title: Scp 8642 32
content:
You blink. Suddenly you’re not sitting at a computer, you’re standing in the doorway of a brightly-lit room. The walls are lined with bookshelves, which themselves are stuffed with books, folders, and papers. In each corner, both on the floor and on the ceiling, is a Scranton Reality Anchor. In the exact center of the room, suspended in the air, is an object that you can’t quite describe, except that it somehow looks like a hole in reality.

“Congratulations!” says a voice from behind you. “You found the Department of Narrative!” You turn around to see Hannah and the rest of the The Department of Everyday Anomalies and Disinformation of Explained, Neutralized, and Decommissioned SCPs, and they’re… Applauding you? Hannah undoubtedly sees the confusion on your face, because she walks over and directs your vision to the bright object suspended in the middle of the room. “That’s the Anti-Narrative. It’s contained by narratives, but we need to keep coming up with new narrative ways to contain it. Our latest containment procedures are… Well, they’re you! All the different choices you’ve made, they weave themselves into a narrative that perfectly contains this anomaly!”

You are still a little confused, but you feel accomplished for some reason. Hannah hands you a card that says “Access Level 5-8642”.

“This makes you an official member of the Department of Narrative!” Hannah exclaims. “I know you’re going to come up with some absolutely amazing stories, and I can’t wait to read every single one of them! In the meantime, though… Would you like to try again to get all 7 endings?”

||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/0 “Yes.”]||= 32||= [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8642/offset/33 “No.”]||
